name: Living room
description: This is where a lot of us spend most of our free time, so naturally it's important to feel comfortable here.

name: Kids room
description: Even kids' rooms can look stylish! Declutter with our storage boxes and find a look that your kid will love.

name: Kitchen
description: We have all your kitchen needs!

name: Outside
description: We have a variety of garden furniture, lighting, decor and even gardening tools. Let your garden become your new sanctuary!

name: Bedroom
description: A bedroom should feel comfortable, cozy and relaxing. We have designs that suit every style with a variety of textiles, small furniture and decor.

name: Office
description: Get inspired and organized with our decor for both corporate offices and home offices.

name: Bathroom
description: Turn your bathroom into a refreshing experience with our decor.
